title: Hangman Game
description: Classic hangman built as a single page app using React. Utilising hooks for state management throughout the app, page display handled via React Router.

title: Online store
description: Online store created with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Utilising session storage to allow customers to save, update items to basket and checkout

title: Developer Portfolio site
description: Showcase of developers work, building fullstack web apps using the MERN technologies.
